summary:
I mentioned a while ago that I wanted a way to filter Podcasts into multiple separate feeds based on their content.  The tool I mention in the previous post, SiftRSS is pretty good, but the only thing it doesnâ€™t currently do is let you change the name of the feed, which means I end up with several feeds with identical names. 
So, I made my own: Baleen...
title: Filter RSS/Podcast feeds
